alert.note: Alert for Southeastern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued January 26 at 2:50AM PST until January 26 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Freezing fog reducing visibility to one-quarter mile or less. * WHERE...Portions of southeastern Elko county, especially near the city of West Wendover. * WHEN..Through 11AM MST/10AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Very low visibility can cause hazardous driving conditions. Frost on area bridges and roads are possible, which could cause slippery roads.
info.instruction: A freezing fog advisory means visibilities will frequently be reduced to less than one quarter mile. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for frost on bridge decks causing slippery roads.
